titles: Whether the preserving the Protestant religion was the motive unto, or the end that was designed in the late revolution in a letter to a country gentleman as an answer to his first query.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
